JobFullDesc: About the role As the sales enablement lead, you'll develop meaningful, helpful enablement programs that will directly impact the growth of our business. You'll flex your talents in content production, training, project management, and relationship building to impact team goals. The ideal candidate is empathetic, energetic, driven, and a self-starter with previous experience in sales or sales training/content creation. This is a role central to our sales growth and effectiveness globally.  What you'll do Assist sales teams in go-to-market strategy and implementation of new products and programsCollaboration with business leaders and subject matter experts to build effective and relevant course content aligned with regional goals and initiativeFacilitate the rollout and adoption of global enablement programs What you'll need Track record of success in sales and account managementDesign and facilitation of sales trainingStakeholder managementAbility to work in a fast-paced environment and juggle multiple priorities and great collaboration skills to work across marketing and sales teams.ResourcefulnessGRIT
